components.description: SOS is the description for the distress signal in Morse Code. This emoji means SOS or “emergency”.
components.title: Squared SOS

description: SOS is the description for the distress signal in Morse Code. This emoji means SOS or “emergency”.
title: Squared SOS

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Enclosed Alphanumeric Supplement -> Squared Latin letter sequences

emoji_net_data.name: SOS button

bn:00072866n: An internationally recognized distress signal in radio code
The conventional Morse code call made by a ship in distress.
The common name of the international Morse code distress signal
SOS is the international Morse code distress signal.

bn:00030525n: A situation which poses an immediate threat to human life or health and requires urgent assistance.
Rescue and transportation services provided by municipal fire brigades and other organizations with comparable mandates
An emergency is a situation that poses an immediate risk to health, life, property, or environment.
A situation such as a natural or man-made disaster requiring urgent assistance.
A call made to an emergency number.
A sudden unforeseen crisis (usually involving danger) that requires immediate action
A situation requiring extreme effort or attention.

bn:00002155n: Action given to provide assistance; aid.
Aid or assistance offered in time of need.
Aid; help; the act or result of assisting.
The activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
The contribution to the fulfilment of a need or the furthering of an effort or purpose.
A UI element that provides access to online Help or other forms of user assistance.

apple_vendor_description: The SOS button emoji on Apple devices is a striking symbol of urgent help, rendered in a vibrant, attention-grabbing red with a glossy, almost reflective surface. Its clean, circular design, typical of Apple's approach to icons, features stark white lettering that stands out boldly, emphasized by realistic lighting to create a sense of depth. The soft rounded edges of the button ensure it feels approachable yet immediately communicates its critical function for summoning assistance.
